summary: The implementation successfully removes phone number authentication and implements the 6-character ID system with backend ID generation, ID claim dialog, frontend displays, admin panel updates, and profile storage changes. All seven requirements have evidence of implementation.

hallucinated_features.description: Migration module (backend/migration.mo) that removes phoneNumber and phoneNumberMap fields from old actor state
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not explicitly require a migration module to handle conversion from old phone number system to new ID system, though it does mention 'migration handles conversion from old PUR-XXXXXX format' in REQ-4 AC. The migration.mo file appears to be an implementation detail beyond the stated requirements.
